name: Law Enforcement Assistance FBI Fingerprint Identification
objective: To provide fingerprint and arrest-record services to U.S. Government and criminal justice agencies; and to provide arrest- record services to State and local governmental authorities, as well as certain authorized nongovernmental entities for employment and licensing purposes.
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support

gwo.name: Advance the Capabilities of the Forensic Sciences
